Notes: Botanist-member of the first team of Argentine scientists to work on Antarctica in 1968,

Notes: Biologist-first woman to be chief scientist of the Australian Antarctic Division,

Notes: Artist-writer,first Australian woman to set foot in Antarctica in 1961

Notes: Cross-country Skier-first woman to ski alone to the South Pole in 1994,

Notes: Adventurer-has skied alone from the coast to the South Pole.,

Notes: Cook of The Second Ukrainian Antarctic Expedition 1997/98
